text: Someone has uncovered markings left by some organization. Following them leads you to a large and well-hidden cache.

options.optionText: This clearly belongs to someone else. Leave it for them and find your own loot.
options.result: You find some salvage nearby. And you are sure someone will appreciate their cache not being stolen.

options.optionText: Take it all for yourself!
options.result: Finders Keepers. Right?

options.optionText: Donating this could earn you some influence
options.result: You take what you can carry and bring it to someone who can really put it to good use.

text: With swift and practiced collaboration, a patrol of regulators surrounds you. 'Say there, partner,' the leader drawls, 'heard there have been killings in these parts. You wouldn't know anything about that, right?'

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Vilified
options.result: The gully erupts with gunfire. A minute later, only you and the leader remain...

options.optionText: Give directions • Choose a Vilified survivor
options.result: You know who they're hunting and where they should look.  They tip their hats to you and head off in that direction.
options.aftermath: That survivor draws and fight [Human] • [Wasteland] Caps

options.optionText: You don't know nothin', send 'em along.
options.result: You tell them you haven't heard about anyone like that. You wish them better luck next time.

text: Two other scavengers approach you with a nervous smile. 'We've heard about a good samaritan around these parts.'

options.optionText: Offer to help them • Idolized
options.result: They thank you for your offer but correct you. They do not need help, they are here to pay you back for the kindness you bring.

options.optionText: Give directions • Choose an Idolized survivor
options.result: They thank you for pointing them in the right direction. They beam at you, clearly impressed by your generosity.
options.aftermath: Become Idolized • That survivor gets [Loot] x [Wasteland] and [Wasteland] Caps

options.optionText: Laugh as you attack the naive fools
options.result: They drop their belongings in horror as you turn your weapon upon them.

text: You hear nothing but your own footsteps as you walk through the ruins. It's calm and quiet.

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Idolized
options.result: Jackpot! This place is filled with stuff. Maybe good deeds really do come around!

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Vilified
options.result: You turn the corner and come face to face with a nasty-looking individual. Just your luck.

options.optionText: Search for useful equipment • [P] [L] 4

result.result: Succeed:You find some items, but you feel like you're missing something.
Fail:You hear voices drifting through the ruins as you search. There's someone here!

text: As you pass through the crowd, you see a familiar face. She's far older, but there's no mistaking her; she has to be Margaret, the girl from the photograph found in the wasteland.

options.optionText: Approach Margaret and tell her about the dead man in the wasteland • [C] 3

result.result: Succeed:As you tell Margaret about the man, you can see she has been expecting this news for some time. 'That's my brother. We came out here to search for our father. When my brother didn't return, I feared the worst. I suppose my father likely met the same fate out there somewhere.' She thanks you for the information as she idly grasps a bird pendant around her neck.
Fail:Margaret wants nothing to do with you. She disappears into the crowd

options.optionText: Leave her alone, and go shopping.
options.result: She likely has enough problems without hearing about some corpse. Besides, you have stuff to sell!

text: As you pick through the ruins, you see someone has scratched the symbol of a bird into the surface of a wall.

options.optionText: That symbol looks familiar; follow it • [P] [I] 4

result.result: Succeed:Following the trail from the symbol, you uncover a skeleton in combat gear. It looks like Margaret's father died a long time ago. His arm rests against an old minigun.
Fail:You search for a while but find only some scraps.

options.optionText: Ignore the symbol and scavenge • [P] 3

result.result: Succeed:No time for a scavener hunt. You need useful gear, now.
Fail:As you search you hear the metallic chunk of robotic feet.

text: A recent explosion has morphed this thriving market into charred ground and waste. The few merchants too poor to move on have set up their stalls nearby.

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Vilified
options.result: The merchants glare at you as you pass. 'You have a lot of nerve coming back here.' One decides that she's had enough and attacks.

options.optionText: Make do with the remaining stand
options.result: It is difficult to shop properly when they are so few with so little, but you try.

options.optionText: Reinvest in the community • Spend 3 Caps
options.result: With no pride left to hinder them, the survivors gladly accept your gift. With stern expressions, they get to work rebuilding their settlement.

text: There is a small gathering around the various traders and mercenaries here, but more guards than usual. Recent events have people on edge.

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Idolized
options.result: The traders seem to recognize you and give you a discount for your 'good deeds.'

options.optionText: Go shopping as normal
options.result: The crowd is smaller today, and you manage to get in more shopping than normal.

options.optionText: Try to steal an item from a display • [A] [L] 5

result.result: Succeed:Despite the tighter security, you manage to grab something without notice.
Fail:The guards leap on you in seconds. They rough you up before kicking you out.

text: A large, scarred man who draws open stares from the guards approaches you in the crowd. He looks you up and down in a way you don't like...

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Idolized
options.result: 'Looks like we've got a do-gooder here. The boss doesn't want you messing with her organization.' He grabs you and drags you away.

options.optionText: Ask if he's got any contraband • Vilified
options.result: Luckily, your reputation precedes you. The man ushers you to a well-hidden booth.
options.aftermath: Draw and add 2 cards to the shop • Shop [Settlement]; buy Weapons and Drugs for 2 less

options.optionText: Brush past him and go back to shopping
options.result: You keep your cool as you converse with the merchants and traders.

text: As you enter the settlement, you see a grisly sight - the strung-up body of a man. A sign reading 'synth' hangs from his chest.

options.optionText: Exact vengeance on these animals! • Synth
options.result: You overhear a nearby man bragging about his role in killing the synth. Looks like you've found your target.

options.optionText: Ignore the body and go about shopping
options.result: You avert your eyes from the body as you do your trading

text: There is a small gathering around the various traders and mercenaries here, and you shoulder your way through the other wastelanders to get a look at the goods.

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Vilified or Synth
options.result: 'Psst, over here!' A young man gestures at you from the shadows. 'I've set up a shop back here for people like you who support my kind. Follow Me!'

options.optionText: Go shopping as normal
options.result: The traders and mercenaries are more than happy to do business with you.

text: You've just found an old footlocker filled with stuff when a shadow falls across you. 'Mine,' says a deep rough voice behind you. Is that... a super mutant?

options.optionText: Make a deal and share • Super Mutant
options.result: Seeing a fellow super mutant, he is happy to make a deal and split the contents of the locker.

options.optionText: Fight him for the loot
Grab something and run! • [E] [A] 4

result.result: Fail:Just as you think you've gotten away, a giant hand closes around your shoulder like a vice.

text: A whimpering dog wanders from person to person in the crowd.

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Idolized
options.result: The dog approaches you and seems to trust you instinctively. He follows at your heels.

options.optionText: Attempt to befriend the dog • [C] 4

result.result: Succeed:While timid at first, the dog warms to you and begins following closely at your heels.
Fail:After chasing the dog around the crowd for a while, you lose him, and most of your opportunity to shop.

options.optionText: Ignore the dog and go shopping
options.result: The poor dog continues wandering from person to person

title: Welcome to the Commonwealth
text: Many dangers lurk in this new wasteland ahead of you, but the one you have heard the most about is the dreaded 'synth.' Said to look, sound, and smell just like humans, they are robots who have infiltrated the very society of the Commonwealth.

options.optionText:
Kill a suspected synth that no one will miss to find out the truth.

Kill any [Human]

This all sounds a bit overblown. Head to Diamon City to discreetly dig up some information.

[Quest] Diamond City

title: Resonance
text: You tear the person apart, but they look to be flesh and blood. Messy. Among their effects, however, is a transponder marked with the Vitruvian man, the words 'The Institute,' and coordinates to the old ruins of the Commonwealth Institute of Technology.

options.optionText:
Follow the coordinates and explore the C.I.T. ruins to find the Institute.

[Quest] C.I.T. Ruins • [E] [I] 4

You have heard only bad things about the Institute. At Diamond City, Caps may quickly get you the information you need.

[Quest] Diamond City • Spend 4 Caps

title: All Aboard!
text:
After asking around in Diamond City, you are approached by a man calling himself 'Drummer Boy.' He explains that the synths are actually the work of an organization known as 'The Institute,' and he asks for your help in freeing them.

Place [Shield] on Downtown Boston

options.optionText:
Warn The Institute about these Railroad agents and get them to deploy more synth soldiers (contact the Institute at [Wasteland] locations).

Place the third [Shield] on the map

Locate and Convince them to cast off their bonds.

[Quest] Adjacent to a [Shield]

text:
If 'All Aboard!' is no longer staged, trash this card and encounter the next card.

You see a figure moving through the ruins wearing a black trench coat and sunglasses.

options.optionText: FORCED if you are a Synth
options.result: 'I've got one,' he says into a microphone before a synth soldier appears out of thin air in front of you!
options.aftermath: Place [Shield] on your space and fight it

options.optionText: Could that be one of the Institute's rumored Coursers? Approach him with information
options.result: He thanks you and calls in more soldiers

options.optionText: Sounds like bad news. Hide from him and go about searching • [P] [A] 4

result.result: Succeed:No way he'd spot you through sunglasses.
Fail:'Take this one out,' he says into a microphone. A synth soldier appears out of thin air!
result.aftermath: Place [Shield] on your space and fight it

title: Uncover The Railroad
text: Impressed by your resourcefulness and persistence, the Institute brings you into their trust. They are developing the most advanced technology ever conceived but are threatened by criminals calling themselves the 'Railroad.'

options.optionText:
Hunt down and eliminate these criminal Railroad agents.

Kill the last [Star] on the map

Locate the Railroad headquarters to give them support

[Quest] The Railroad

title: All Hell
text:
Chaos erupts in the Commonwealth! Stirred up by newcomers asking too many questions, the Institute accelerates their mysterious plans, and the Railroad responds in kind, Fights break out across the wasteland!

Place [Star] equal to survivors. Each on [Settlement], 1 per [Settlement], starting with the highest level. Place [Shield] at each [Star].

options.optionText:
Wipe out the Railroad's agents in the wasteland.

Kill the last [Star] on the map

Eliminate all the militarized synths; you have no other choice.

Kill the last [Shield] on the map

title: Institutionalized
text: From the freed synths, you learn all about the Institute's hidden, underground factory where they develop the synths. The only way you are going to be able to get in there is by posing as a member.

options.optionText:
Warn the Institute of the infiltrators. You'll need circuitry to build a radio capable of reaching them.

Kill any [Robot]

The Railroad headquarters will have everything you'd need to pose as an Institute scientist.

[Quest] The Railroad • [P] [E] [A] 4

title: Bunker Hill
text: With the Institute's agents hunting Railroad members in the field, the Railroad has managed to free a large group of synths, and they are looking for a way out of the Commonwealth.

options.optionText:
Locate the synth's safe house before they escape.

Encounter level-3 or higher [Wasteland] until you locate the synths

Find the synths and get them to safety.

Encounter level-3 or higher [Wasteland] until you save the synths

text:
If at a level-2 or lower [Wasteland], encounter the next card. Then, add this card.

You are caught in the middle of a firefight! Synth soldiers are systematically advancing on a small band of Railroad members defending a group of huddling people.

options.optionText: Help the Institute • Draw and fight [Star]

result.result: Succeed:You easily eliminate the rebels and 'decommission' the escaped synths.
Fail:You fall back, but the fight rages on.

options.optionText: Help the Railroad • Draw and fight [Shield]

result.result: Fail:You fall back, but the fight rages on.

options.optionText: You can't afford to be caught in a battle right now. Run the other direction.
options.result: The sound of combat fade behind you.

title: The Molecular Level
text:
With the Institute fully aware of their actions, the Railroad's only hope of getting to the Institute is by using their own technology against them. The Railroad has begun work on a signal interceptor to teleport themselves into the Institute.

Place a quest marker 3 spaces away from your current space. This is the Signal Interceptor.

options.optionText:
Destroy the interceptor before it's complete

[Quest] Signal Interceptor • [S] [I] [A] 5

Acquire the needed circuitry to finish the interceptor

When a [Robot] is killed, place 1 Cap on this card.

Place the third Cap on this card

title: Derailed
text:
With the Railroad weakened by it's recent defeat, the Institute has deployed one of its dreaded Coursers to deal with them once and for all.

Place a quest marker at C.I.T. Ruins. This is an Institute Courser. [Star] move toward the Courser instead of survivors.

At the end of each round, remove [Star] from the Courser's space. If there are no [Star] in the Courser's space, move it 1 space toward the Railroad instead.

options.optionText:
Lead the Courser straight to the Railroad headquarters.

The Courser is at the Railroad

Things are falling apart. Pay to smuggle out as many synths as you can before the end.

[Quest] Any [Settlement] • Spend 8 Caps

title: The Minutemen
text:
The conflict has thrown the Commonwealth into chaos and attracted the attention of its self appointed defenders: the Minutemen.

Place a quest marker at Diamond City. This is the Minutement militia.

Survivors in the same space as the Minutemen can perform the follwing action: Test [C] [I] 2 • Move the Minutemen a number of spaces equal to the number of [Hits] by which you exceeded the test.

options.optionText:
Manipulate the Minutemen forces into attacking the Railroad

The Minutemen are at the Railroad

Convince the Minutemen to attack the Institute.

The Minutemen are at the C.I.T. Ruins

text: A group of Minutemen struts through the settlement. They smile and tip their hats, but nevertheless, people seem to give them a wide berth.

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Idolized
options.result: They smile and approach you. 'We've heard about your deeds around the wasteland and would like to offer you a membership.'
options.aftermath: <strong>Keep this card; when testing to move the Minutemen, add 2 [Hits]

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Vilified
options.result: Ugh, the boy scouts came up behind you and turn you around as you are talking to a trader. 'I think it's time for you to leave, criminal.'

options.optionText: They don't notice you, so go shopping

text: You spot a group of Minutemen spread out across the ruined area.

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Idolized
options.result: They smile and approach you. 'We've heard about your deeds around the wasteland and would like to offer you a membership.'
options.aftermath: <strong>Keep this card; when testing to move the Minutemen, add 2 [Hits]

options.optionText: FORCED if you are Vilified
options.result: Those bullies spot you immediately and head in your direction. 'Let's deal with this one now.'

options.optionText: They don't notice you, so continue searching.

title: The Nuclear Option
text:
The Railroad has infiltrated the Institute and has incited a mass revolt! They now plan to finish off the Institute once and for all.

Place [Star] and a quest marker at the Railroad. This quest marker is the reactor blueprint.

A survivor in the same space as the blueprint can move the blueprint with his or her figure. When doing this, treat all spaces as difficult terrain.

options.optionText:
Take out as many of the rebels as possible; synths and Railroad alike.

Kill any [Star] or [Shield]

The Railroad has blueprints of the Institute's reactor. If they can get the blueprints there, they can set it to blow and end this forever.

The blueprint is at the C.I.T. Ruins

title: Welcome to Far Harbor
text: A sickly-green fog has spread across much of this island. Every structure you pass has been abandoned, but you see dangerous-looking shapes moving in the mists.

options.optionText:
The fog calls to you. Travel into the mists, let it embrace you.

Suffer 2 [Radiation] during the same turn

The strange machines are the only sign of civilization left on this island. Investigate them.

Place a [Star]

title: Stranger Machines
text: Bizarre devices dot the terrain around certain locations on the island. Most seem broken from wear or sabotage, but look easy enough to fix.

options.optionText:
Once running, these machines stop Atom's fog! Unacceptable! Smash them.

[Quest] Any [Star] • [S] 3

Attempt to communicate with the aliens and make a deal.

[Quest] any [Wasteland] or [Settlement] without [Star] • [E] [I] 4

text:
If there is [Star] on this space, encounter the next card. Then, add this card

Without the protection of the fog condensers, the people in this settlement have fled the concoming fog. You walk through a ghost town.

options.optionText: Fix up the fog condensor • [E] [I] 4

result.result: Fail: You manage only to frustrate yourself banging away on the machine.

options.optionText: Praise Atom! Await the fog
options.result: You watch as the fog swirls around the buildings.
options.aftermath: If there is no [Shield] in this space, place [Shield]

options.optionText: Steal some stuff. No one is here to stop you
options.result: The traders took their wares with them, but you find some odds and ends.

title: Embrace the Glow
text: As you camp in the fog, you are approached by a robed figure. She is from the Church of the Children of Atom, and they want help spreading the fog.

options.optionText:
Time for some missionary work! Spread Atom's love to more of the island.

When a [Shield] is placed on the map when there is already at least 1 [Shield] on the map

Warn the local town of Far Harbor of the fanatical cult's plans.

[Quest] Far Harbor

title: The Last Bastion
text: You find a break in the fog and people still alive on this island! They say that there are several pockets of civiliation left in the fog, but most people are either members of the Church of the Children of the Atom or holed up at the port town of Far Harbor

options.optionText:
Still the fog calls. Help it spread its tendrils out into the island.

When a [Shield] is placed on the map

Reach Far Harbor to find out what is really happening on the island.

[Quest] Far Harbor

title: Choking Fog
text: As the fog continues to consume the island, Far Harbor has begun to erect mechanical devices called 'Fog Condensers' that stop the fog from consuming certain areas.

options.optionText:
Continue to help the church bring Atom's grace to the island.

When a [Shield] is placed on the map when there are already at least 3 [Shield] on the map

Help erect condensers to help slow the spread of fog.

When a [Star] is placed on the map when there is already at least 1 [Star] on the map

title: Initiation
text: The fog that now covers much of the island has mutated and enraged the creatures, and now they threaten Far Harbor! Meanwhile, the Church is safe in its cave base at the Nucleus.

options.optionText:
Go to the Nucleus to join the Children of Atom

[Quest] The Nucleus

Kill the creature that threatens Far Harbor

Kill any [Monster]

title: Infiltration
text: With some condensers up and running, Far Harbor has earned enough breathing room to figure out what is really going on here.

options.optionText:
You need the proper knowledge of how these condensers work. Study similar technology.

Kill any [Robot]

Head to the Nucleus to infiltrate the Children of Atom for information

[Quest] The Nucleus

title: Acadia In Need
text: Caught in the middle of everything involving the fog is the hideout of Acadia, run by the synth DiMa. Ambivalent to the conflict between Far Harbor or the Church, he has one goal: to help as many escaped synths as possible.

options.optionText:
Convince the synths to avoid Acadia and stay to help the island.

Encounter any [Settlement] until you locate the synth

Guide the synths to the refuge of Acadia

Encounter any [Settlement] until you locate the synth

text: As you pass through the people gathered to trade, you spot someone who matches he description of the synth DiMa was looking for.

options.optionText: Leverage your knowledge of the synth to get her to help you • [S] [C] 4

result.result: Succeed: Angered that you know her secret, she nevertheless agrees to help.
Fail: Outraged by your threat, she hits you and flees into the crowd.

options.optionText: Quietly tell the synth about Acadia
options.result: She thanks you and heads off in the direction of Acadia, promising that she won't forget this.

options.optionText: Ignore the synth and go shopping
options.result: The synth continues about her day none the wiser
